## Properties

| **Property**                        | **Values**                                   | **Default**
|-----------------------------------  |----------------------------------------------| -----------------------------------------------
| Has start icon `Boolean`            | `true \| false`                              | `true`
| Start icon  `InstanceSwap`          | `Any icon`                                   | `alert-02-filled`
| Title `Text`                        | `string`                                     | `Alert title`
| Has content `Boolean`               | `true \| false`                              | `true`
| Content `Text`                      | `string`                                     | `Alert content`
| Has action `Boolean`                | `true \| false`                              | `true`
| Has dismiss `Boolean`               | `true \| false`                              | `true`

## When to use

{<svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" style={{ display: 'inline', verticalAlign: 'middle' }}><path d="M5 13l4 4L19 7" style={{ stroke: "var(--text-positive)" }} strokeWidth="2" /></svg>} When users need to be informed about important changes, warnings or confirmations in a clear and non-intrusive way. <br/>
{<svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" style={{ display: 'inline', verticalAlign: 'middle' }}><path d="M5 13l4 4L19 7" style={{ stroke: "var(--text-positive)" }} strokeWidth="2" /></svg>} When the message is relevant to the surrounding content and should be noticed without blocking user interaction. <br/><br/>
{<svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" style={{ display: 'inline', verticalAlign: 'middle' }}><path d="M6 6L18 18M6 18L18 6" style={{ stroke: "var(--text-negative)" }} strokeWidth="2" /></svg>} If the message requires immediate attention or blocks user progress, use dialog instead. <br/>
{<svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" style={{ display: 'inline', verticalAlign: 'middle' }}><path d="M6 6L18 18M6 18L18 6" style={{ stroke: "var(--text-negative)" }} strokeWidth="2" /></svg>} If the information is persistent and should remain visible at all times. <br/>
